title: configure-module input
description: Basic configuration of the Mail module

mailbox_quota_mb.title: User mailbox quota
mailbox_quota_mb.description: Default user mailbox quota expressed in MB (megabytes). Set to 0 to disable quota completely.

user_domain.title: User domain name
user_domain.description: Must be the name of a configured user domain

mail_domain.title: Initial mail domain
mail_domain.description: Create the first mail domain with default values. Ignored if the module was already configured.

hostname.title: Mail host name
hostname.description: Host name used as SMTP/HELO and for the TLS certificate
